text: kah do, "main tumase yah nahin kahata ki mere paas allaah ke khazaane hai, aur na main paroksh ka gyaan rakhata hoon, aur na main tumase kahata hoon ki main koee farishta hoon. main to bas usee ka anupaalan karata hoon jo meree or vahyan kee jaatee hai." kaho, "kya andha aur aankhonvaala donon baraabar ho jaenge? kya tum soch-vichaar se kaam nahin lete
